description:
Observations to London Borough of Hackney in connection with proposed erection of part 16 storey plus basement building to provide 73,178sqm of net office floorspace and 985sqm of net retail floorspace (Class  A1/A3) 330sqm of net floorspace of A1/A3/B1/D1/D2 together with 64 car, 92 motorcycle and 222 bicycle parking spaces, new vehicular and pedestrian access and landscaping, plus demolition of existing buildings/structures. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  2019A, 2002C, 2100A, 2101A,                         2102A, 2200A, 2201A, 2202A, 2203A,                         2204A, 2205A, 2300A, 2301A, 2302
decision_conditions: The Council has no objection to the proposed scheme.
